text: Italy is divided into 20 Regions (Regioni in Italian) and every Region is divided into Provinces. There are 110 provinces in Italy. Each province is headed by a President assisted by a representative body, the Provincial Council, and an executive body, the Provincial Executive. The three main jobs of a province are: * Local planning and zoning * Provision of local police and fire services. * Transportation regulation (car registration, maintenance of local roads, etc.)
